infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FitAI uses the camera to provide real-time form feedback during workouts.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FitAI needs access to your photo library to save workout progress photos.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: FitAI syncs your workout data to Apple Health for comprehensive fitness tracking.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: FitAI updates Apple Health with calories burned and workout sessions.

plugins.cameraPermission: FitAI uses the camera to provide real-time form feedback during workouts.
